TopicTitle: next playthrough mod list feedback: what would you add? What would you remove? And why?

Articles.Content:
I'm getting ready to start a new game in Science mode (career too grindy for money >_<). I totally don't have a modding addiction and have put together this short list of mods:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4pmo21z6683hx9q/Yolosaurus_rex_modlist.txt?dl=0

I'd love feedback on it. What are your thoughts? Would you recommend adding anything? Would you recommend removing anything?
That's not a short list. It has everything except the kitchen sink. What do you want to achieve in your play through?

Essentially any dropbox link ending "dl=0" can be improved by making it read "dl=1".

What, no Project Orion? The SuicidalInsanity mod is good.

I'd remove the Alcubierre "drive" and anything else magical.
